skills.name: Arcane Blast
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with a mysterious energy and stuns them for 1 turn with an 18% chance.

Effect Rate +10%

Damage +10%

skill_effect.name: Stun
skill_effect.description: Enemy is stunned and immobilized for a number of turns

skills.name: Dark Nova
skills.description: Explodes compressed energy of darkness to inflict damage to an enemy. The more HP the targeted enemy currently has, the larger the damage becomes.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Damage +10%
Cooltime Turn -1
Cooltime Turn -1
skills.multiplier_formula: <mark>ATK</mark>*(4.0*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Target's HP percentage in range 0 to 1, with 1 being full HP.">Target Current HP %</mark> + 5.0)

skills.name: Fiery Path
skills.description: Burns the enemy's souls with soul fire, disturbing HP recovery and Branding the target for 3 turns. The enemy can't be revived if the enemy is killed with this skill.

skill_effect.name: Anti-Revive
skill_effect.description: Prevents an enemy from being resurrected after being killed.

skill_effect.name: Brand
skill_effect.description: Enemies with Branding Effect take 25% more Damage

skill_effect.name: Disturb HP Recovery
skill_effect.description: Healing effects are blocked for a number of turns
